title: Face Mask Detection
description: A computer vision project using deep learning to detect whether people are wearing face masks in images and videos. Uses CNN models trained on custom datasets.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application enabling users to communicate over the internet with features like text messaging, file sharing, and group chats.

title: Banking Management System
description: A comprehensive software application for banks to manage operations including customer accounts, transactions, loans, and financial activities efficiently.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
description: A classic implementation of the Tic-Tac-Toe game where two players take turns marking spaces in a 3Ã—3 grid. Features AI opponent and multiplayer mode.

title: Blood Donation App
description: A mobile application connecting blood donors with blood banks and individuals in need. Features donor registration, donation history tracking, and location-based notifications.
